https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uE1D5fBFQhlfTrIZrtFuNaL93Bj.jpg A young girl struggles after a traumatic horse riding accident causes her to lose her eyesight. CHARLES, the head trainer of Southeastern Guide Dogs, trains Apple, a miniature horse, to be her companion and surrogate eyes. Apple of My Eye
